Command.CommandString: SELECT * FROM CMD_Warehouse where {0} order by WarehouseCode
DELETE FROM CMD_WAREHOUSE WHERE WarehouseCode='{0}'
Insert into CMD_WAREHOUSE (WarehouseCode,WarehouseName,MEMO) values(@WarehouseCode,@WarehouseName,@MEMO)
update CMD_WAREHOUSE set WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,WarehouseName=@WarehouseName,MEMO=@MEMO where WarehouseCode={0}
SELECT * FROM CMD_Area where {0} order by AreaCode
delete from CMD_Area WHERE AreaCode='{0}'
Insert into CMD_Area(WarehouseCode,AreaCode,AreaName,Memo) values(@WarehouseCode,@AreaCode,@AreaName,@Memo)
update CMD_Area set AreaName=@AreaName,Memo=@Memo where AreaCode={0}
SELECT * FROM CMD_Shelf where {0} ORDER BY ShelfCode,AreaCode
delete from CMD_Shelf WHERE ShelfCode='{0}'
Insert into CMD_Shelf (WarehouseCode,AreaCode,ShelfCode,ShelfName,Rows,Columns,Memo,IsActive) values(@WarehouseCode,@AreaCode,@ShelfCode,@ShelfName,@Rows,@Columns,@Memo,@IsActive)
update CMD_Shelf set ShelfName=@ShelfName,Rows=@Rows,Columns=@Columns,WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,AreaCode=@AreaCode,IsActive=@IsActive,Memo=@Memo where ShelfCode='{0}'
select * from CMD_Cell WHERE {0} ORDER BY AreaCode,ShelfCode,CellCode
delete from CMD_Cell WHERE CellCode='{0}'
Insert into CMD_Cell(CellCode,CellName,AreaCode,ShelfCode,CellRow,CellColumn,IsActive,IsLock,Memo) values(@CellCode,@CellName,@AreaCode,@ShelfCode,@CellRow,@CellColumn,@IsActive,@IsLock,@Memo)

select WarehouseCode as id,'0' as pid,'仓库：'+WarehouseName as name from CMD_Warehouse union all select AreaCode as id,WarehouseCode as PID, '库区:'+AreaName as name from CMD_Area union all select ShelfCode as id,AreaCode as PID,'货架:'+ShelfName as name from CMD_Shelf shelf union all select CellCode as id,ShelfCode as pid,'货位:'+CellName as name from CMD_Cell

select cmd.*, house.WarehouseName,area.AreaName from CMD_ProductType cmd inner join CMD_Area area on cmd.AreaCode=area.AreaCode inner join CMD_Warehouse house on area.WarehouseCode=house.WarehouseCode where {0} order by ProductTypeCode

insert into CMD_ProductType(ProductTypeCode,ProductTypeName,WarehouseCode,AreaCode,Memo,Creator,CreateDate,Updater,UpdateDate) values(@ProductTypeCode,@ProductTypeName,@WarehouseCode,@AreaCode,@Memo,@Creator,getdate(),@Updater,getdate())
update CMD_ProductType set ProductTypeName=@ProductTypeName,WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,AreaCode=@AreaCode,Memo=@Memo,Updater=@Updater,UpdateDate=getdate() where ProductTypeCode=@ProductTypeCode
delete from CMD_ProductType where ProductTypeCode in({0})
Select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by CIGARETTECODE) as RowIndex,* from AS_BI_CIGARETTE where {0} order by CIGARETTECODE
Select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by BillTypeCode) as RowIndex,* from CMD_BillType where {0} order by BillTypeCode
delete from CMD_COLOR WHERE ID in({0})

INSERT INTO CMD_COLOR(ID,COLOR_CODE,PRODUCT_CODE,PRODUCT_Model,COLOR_NAME,MEMO,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@ID,@COLOR_CODE,@PRODUCT_CODE,@PRODUCT_Model,@COLOR_NAME,@MEMO, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
Update CMD_COLOR Set COLOR_CODE=@COLOR_CODE,COLOR_NAME=@COLOR_NAME,PRODUCT_CODE=@PRODUCT_CODE,MEMO=@MEMO,PRODUCT_Model=@PRODUCT_Model,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where ID={0}
Select * from CMD_BillType where {0} order by BillTypeCode
delete from CMD_BillType WHERE BillTypeCode in({0})

INSERT INTO CMD_BillType(Flag,BillTypeCode,BillTypeName,TaskType,TaskLevel,Memo, Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@Flag,@BillTypeCode,@BillTypeName,@TaskType,@TaskLevel,@Memo, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
Update CMD_BillType Set BillTypeName=@BillTypeName,Memo=@Memo,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where BillTypeCode=@BillTypeCode

select product.*,CCLXFactory.FactoryName as CCLXFactoryName,FCCLXFactory.FactoryName as FCCLXFactoryName,CXFactory.FactoryName as CXFactoryName, ProductType.ProductTypeName ,TrainType.TypeName as TrainTypeName,null as InStockDate,Area.AreaName from CMD_Product product left join CMD_ProductType ProductType on product.ProductTypeCode=ProductType.ProductTypeCode left join CMD_TrainType TrainType on product.TrainTypeCode=TrainType.TypeCode left join CMD_Factory CCLXFactory on product.CCLX_FactoryID=CCLXFactory.FactoryID left join CMD_Factory FCCLXFactory on product.FCCLX_FactoryID=FCCLXFactory.FactoryID left join CMD_Factory CXFactory on product.CX_FactoryID=CXFactory.FactoryID left join CMD_Area Area on product.AreaCode=Area.AreaCode where {0}
delete from CMD_PRODUCT WHERE ProductCode in({0})

Update CMD_PRODUCT Set ProductName=@ProductName,ProductTypeCode=@ProductTypeCode,TrainTypeCode=@TrainTypeCode,AxieNo=@AxieNo,WheelDiameter=@WheelDiameter, CCZ_Diameter=@CCZ_Diameter,FCCZ_Diameter=@FCCZ_Diameter,CCD_Diameter=@CCD_Diameter,FCCD_Diameter=@FCCD_Diameter,CCXPBZW_Size=@CCXPBZW_Size,FCCXPBZW_Size=@FCCXPBZW_Size, GearNo=@GearNo,CCLX_Flag=@CCLX_Flag,FCCLX_Flag=@FCCLX_Flag,CCLX_Year=@CCLX_Year,FCCLX_Year=@FCCLX_Year,CCLX_Factory=@CCLX_Factory,FCCLX_Factory=@FCCLX_Factory,CX_Factory=@CX_Factory, CCLG_Flag=@CCLG_Flag,FCCLG_Flag=@FCCLG_Flag,Memo=@Memo,WarehouseCode=@WarehouseCode,AreaCode=@AreaCode,Updater=@Updater,UpdateDate=getdate(),LDXC=@LDXC,CX_DateTime=@CX_DateTime where ProductCode=@ProductCode
Select *,case when Flag=1 then '齿侧轮芯厂家' when Flag=2 then '非齿侧轮芯厂家' else '承修厂家' end as FlagName from CMD_Factory where {0} order by Flag,FactoryID
delete from CMD_Factory WHERE FactoryID in({0})

INSERT INTO CMD_Factory(FactoryID, Flag,FactoryName, LinkPerson, LinkPhone, Fax, Address, MEMO,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@FactoryID,@Flag,@FactoryName,@LinkPerson,@LinkPhone,@Fax,@Address,@MEMO, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())

Update CMD_Factory Set FactoryName=@FactoryName,Flag=@Flag,LinkPerson=@LinkPerson,LinkPhone=@LinkPhone,Fax=@Fax, Address=@Address, MEMO=@MEMO,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where FactoryID='{0}'
Select * from CMD_TrainType where {0} order by TypeCode
delete from CMD_TrainType WHERE TypeCode in({0})
INSERT INTO CMD_TrainType(TypeCode,TypeName,MEMO,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@TypeCode,@TypeName,@MEMO, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())
Update CMD_TrainType Set TypeName=@TypeName, MEMO=@MEMO,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where TypeCode='{0}'
Select * from View_CMD_Customer where {0} order by AreaSation,CUSTOMER_CODE
delete from CMD_CUSTOMER WHERE {0}

INSERT INTO CMD_CUSTOMER(CUSTOMER_CODE,CUSTOMER_NAME,CUSTOMER_PERSON,CUSTOMER_PHONE,CUSTOMER_Fax,MEMO,PLAYCUSTOMER_CODE,CustomerType,AreaSation,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@CUSTOMER_CODE,@CUSTOMER_NAME,@CUSTOMER_PERSON,@CUSTOMER_PHONE,@CUSTOMER_Fax,@MEMO,@PLAYCUSTOMER_CODE,@CustomerType,@AreaSation, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())

Update CMD_CUSTOMER Set CUSTOMER_NAME=@CUSTOMER_NAME,CUSTOMER_PERSON=@CUSTOMER_PERSON, CUSTOMER_PHONE=@CUSTOMER_PHONE,CUSTOMER_Fax=@CUSTOMER_Fax, MEMO=@MEMO,PLAYCUSTOMER_CODE=@PLAYCUSTOMER_CODE,CustomerType=@CustomerType,AreaSation=@AreaSation,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where CUSTOMER_CODE='{0}'
select distinct areasation from CMD_CUSTOMER
Select * from CMD_CUSTOMERSUB where {0} order by OrderNum
delete from CMD_CUSTOMERSUB WHERE {0}
INSERT INTO CMD_CUSTOMERSUB(CUSTOMER_CODE,RowID,PERSON,PHONE,Address,OrderNum) values(@CUSTOMER_CODE,@RowID,@PERSON,@PHONE,@Address,@OrderNum)
select PERSON from CMD_CUSTOMERSUB where CUSTOMER_CODE=@CUSTOMER_CODE group by PERSON order by min(OrderNum),min(RowID)
select PHONE from CMD_CUSTOMERSUB where CUSTOMER_CODE=@CUSTOMER_CODE group by PHONE order by min(OrderNum),min(RowID)
select Address from CMD_CUSTOMERSUB where CUSTOMER_CODE=@CUSTOMER_CODE group by Address order by min(OrderNum),min(RowID)

select Main.*,sub.*,playcust.CUSTOMER_NAME as PlayCustomerName from CMD_CUSTOMER Main left join CMD_CUSTOMERSUB Sub on main.CUSTOMER_CODE=sub.CUSTOMER_CODE left join CMD_CUSTOMER PlayCust on main.PLAYCUSTOMER_CODE=playcust.CUSTOMER_CODE
Select * from CMD_DEPARTMENT where {0}
delete from CMD_DEPARTMENT WHERE Department_Code in({0})
INSERT INTO CMD_DEPARTMENT(Department_Code,Department_Name,MEMO) values(@Department_Code,@Department_Name,@MEMO)
Update CMD_DEPARTMENT Set Department_Name=@Department_Name,MEMO=@MEMO where Department_Code='{0}'
select CMD_DEPARTMENT_SUB.*,CMD_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NAME from CMD_DEPARTMENT_SUB left join CMD_PRODUCT on CMD_PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE=CMD_DEPARTMENT_SUB.PRODUCT_CODE where {0}
delete from CMD_DEPARTMENT_SUB WHERE {0}
INSERT INTO CMD_DEPARTMENT_SUB(DEPARTMENT_CODE,RowID,PRODUCT_CODE) values(@DEPARTMENT_CODE,@RowID,@PRODUCT_CODE)
Update CMD_DEPARTMENT_SUB Set PRODUCT_CODE=@PRODUCT_CODE where {0}

select WAREHOUSE_CODE as id,'0' as pid,'仓库：'+WAREHOUSE_NAME as name from CMD_WAREHOUSE where IsManage=1 union all select AREA_CODE as id,WAREHOUSE_CODE as PID, '库区:'+AREA_NAME as name from CMD_WH_AREA union all select SHELF_CODE as id,AREA_CODE as PID,'货架:'+SHELF_NAME as name from CMD_WH_SHELF
select AREA_CODE ,AREA_NAME from CMD_WH_AREA
SELECT * FROM V_CMD_WH_CELL_ALL WHERE AREA_CODE = @AreaCode ORDER BY SHELF_CODE,CELL_CODE
SELECT * FROM V_CMD_WH_CELL_ALL WHERE AREA_CODE = @AreaCode and {0} ORDER BY SHELF_CODE,CELL_CODE
SELECT * FROM V_CMD_WH_CELL_ALL WHERE SHELF_CODE = @ShelfCode ORDER BY SHELF_CODE,CELL_CODE
select MIN(Product_Code) as MinProduct,MAX(product_code) as MaxProduct,MIN(PRODUCT_MODEL) as MinModel,MAX(PRODUCT_MODEL) as MaxModel from V4_CMD_PRODUCT
sp_ProductQuery
sp_OtherProductQuery
select MIN(CUSTOMER_CODE) as MinCust,MAX(CUSTOMER_CODE) as MaxCust,MIN(CUSTOMER_NAME) as MinName,MAX(CUSTOMER_NAME) as MaxName from CMD_CUSTOMER
select MIN(FactoryID) as MinCust,MAX(FactoryID) as MaxCust,MIN(FactoryName) as MinName,MAX(FactoryName) as MaxName from CMD_Factory
Select * from View_CMD_ProductBom where {0} order by orderNum,ProductNo
delete from CMD_ProductBOM WHERE ProductNo in({0})

INSERT INTO CMD_ProductBOM(ProductNo,Name,Unit,Product_Code,ColorID,Memo,StandPrice, Price1, Price2, Price3, Price4, Price5, OrderNum,Creator, CreateDate, Updater, UpdateDate) values(@ProductNo,@Name,@Unit,@Product_Code,@ColorID,@Memo,@StandPrice,@Price1,@Price2,@Price3,@Price4,@Price5,@OrderNum, @Creator, getdate(), @Updater, getdate())

Update CMD_ProductBOM Set Name=@Name,Unit=@Unit,Product_Code=@Product_Code,ColorID=@ColorID,Memo=@Memo,StandPrice=@StandPrice, Price1=@Price1, Price2=@Price2, Price3=@Price3, Price4=@Price4, Price5=@Price5, OrderNum=@OrderNum,Updater=@Updater, UpdateDate=getdate() where ProductNo='{0}'
